name: The Aftermath - Wasteland
description:
A Challenging Post-Apocalyptic Multiplayer Game
• A world devastated by a comet impact that turned most humans into zombies
• Large open world for exploration and scavenging
• Crafting system for creating items, structures, and technology development
• Linear yet engaging story that uncovers new areas, enemies, and resources
• Cooperative or competitive play with other players, forming alliances or engaging in conflicts
• Social component with regular limited-time events, seasonal content, and weekly challenges
• Ultimate objective of making the world habitable again provides a clear sense of purpose
• Designed to keep players engaged with regular updates, events, and new content
• Emphasis on community-building, exploration, and progression for a rich and immersive experience

Note: This game is currently in development. Since this is a university assignment with no asset designer in the team, we are heavily relying on the Unity asset store and CGTrader for the free assets.
